TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataControlFieldCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class DataControlFieldCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class DataControlFieldCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件（如 和 ）使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are used by data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 数据绑定控件用来指定其子控件的呈现方式的对象的集合。The class represents a collection of objects used by data-bound controls to specify how their child controls are presented. 类派生自 ，后者专门用于存储 对象。The class derives from , an abstract base collection class used specifically to store objects. 对象影响对象的行为 。A object influences the behavior of a object. 还原状态时，动态添加到集合中的对象将重新添加到控件中。 objects that are dynamically added to the collection will be re-added to the control when state is restored. 这意味着，需要在每次回发时添加、删除或更改字段，而不是每次回发，因为 ASP.NET 中的大多数集合类型都需要。This means that a field needs to be added, removed, or changed just once instead of on each postback, as most collection types in ASP.NET require. ( 类实现 接口，该接口使其能够将其状态存储在 ASP.NET 视图状态中。(The class implements the interface, which enables it to store its state in ASP.NET view state. )) 使用 类以编程方式管理一组 对象。Use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 请注意，以声明方式定义这些字段更为常见。Note that it is more common to define these fields declaratively. 您可以使用类的适当方法添加、插入和移除 对象 。You can add, insert, and remove objects using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以编程方式 从集合中检索对象，请使用以下方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - 使用索引器 从集合中使用数组表示法获取单个对象。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection using array notation. - 使用 方法可创建实现了的 对象，然后可以使用该对象从集合中获取项。Use the method to create a -implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. 属性指定集合中的总项数，并且通常用于确定集合的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以使用 、 、 和方法向集合中添加项，也可以从集合中移除项 。You can add items to and remove items from the collection using the , , , and methods. 如果使用的是 或 控件，则会 自动创建的对象 (例如，当 属性为) 时， `true` 不会存储在可公开访问的字段集合中。If you are using the or control, the objects that are automatically created (for example, when the property is `true`) are not stored in the publicly accessible fields collection. 只能访问和操作 不会自动生成的对象。You can only access and manipulate objects that are not automatically generated. 下表列出了不同的数据控件字段类及其使用方式。The following table lists the different data control field classes and how they are used. |参数类Parameter Class|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||所有字段的抽象基类。The abstract base class for all fields.| ||数据绑定控件字段，用于绑定到从 ASP.NET 数据源控件检索到的文本或数据。A data-bound control field that is used to bind to text or data retrieved from an ASP.NET data source control.| ||一个封装常规按钮功能的数据绑定控件字段。A data-bound control field that encapsulates general button functionality. 和 派生自。 and are derived from it.| ||至少显示一个按钮的数据绑定控件字段。A data-bound control field that displays at least one button.| ||显示控件的数据绑定控件字段 。A data-bound control field that displays a control.| ||数据绑定控件字段，显示可对行 (或列) 显示的数据（如编辑、更新或删除）执行的操作。A data-bound control field that displays actions that can be performed on the data displayed by the row (or column), such as edit, update, or delete.| ||显示控件的数据绑定控件字段 。A data-bound control field that displays a control.| ||显示控件的数据绑定控件字段 。A data-bound control field that displays an control.| ||数据绑定控件字段，用于在数据绑定控件中显示自定义内容。A data-bound control field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.|

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将对象追加 到集合的末尾。Use the method to append a object to the end of the collection. 此方法的实现采用 由参数指定的对象 `field` ，并将其追加到集合。This implementation of the method takes the object specified by the `field` parameter and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 对象动态添加 到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to dynamically add a object to a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法创建当前集合的副本。Use the method to create a copy of the current collection. 此方法主要由设计时对话框用来实现在取消操作时的回滚行为。This method is used primarily by design-time dialog boxes to implement rollback behavior when an operation is canceled.
